    • Method Detail

      • upload

        public java.lang.String upload(java.lang.String path)
        Uploads the file given by the path to our system structure and renames it if needed
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the file to copy
        Returns:
        The new path of the copied file. If the path isnt valid, the returned String is empty
